p: At the age of 15 the patient, who was under therapy with Valproate, Topiramate, and Rufinamide, presented with a sudden worsening of the general conditions with repeated vomiting, weight loss, and a significant increase in the frequency of epileptic seizures, which consisted of generalized onset motor tonic-clonic seizures occurring 5â€“6 times per day. The electroencephalogram showed background rhythm slowing in the left hemisphere and bilateral multifocal paroxysmal activity.
